## Inter-rater reliability-Cohen’s kappa

```{r, echo=F, message=F, warning=F}
kappa_pvalue=numeric()
kappa_value=numeric()
for (i in 1:length(data))
{
sub_data=data[[i]]
ratings=sub_data%>% select(`CVMS IH`, `CVMS 1D`) %>% drop_na()
kappa_test=kappa2(ratings)
kappa_value[i]=kappa_test$value
kappa_pvalue[i]=kappa_test$p.value
}
data.frame(kappa_value=round(kappa_value,4), kappa_pvalue=pvalue_adjust(kappa_pvalue)) %>%
datatable(extensions = 'Buttons',
          caption = "Cohen’s kappa", 
            options = list(dom = 'Blfrtip',
                           buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel', 'pdf', 'print'),
                           lengthMenu = list(c(10,25,50,-1),
                                             c(10,25,50,"All"))))
```
